Name: Puzzle of Puzzles
Description:
The Pioneer Association is offering generous prizes for "Hsin's Fortuity", among them is the surprise jackpot, and Changli manages to draw it. To make things more dramatic, the prize is a treasure map about a Court of Savantae legacy...

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.
QuestDesc:
The Pioneer Association is offering generous prizes for "Hsin's Fortuity", among them is the surprise jackpot, and Changli manages to draw it. To make things more dramatic, the prize is a treasure map about a Court of Savantae legacy...

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, it's you, {PlayerName}. I'm watching these people try their luck in the lucky draw.

Options.PlotLineKey: Aren't you going to give it a go?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I guess it wouldn't hurt to give it a try.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Changli walks over to the stall and casually spins the wheel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...And there it is. Lady Changli wins again. Just like last year, no, just like those every other time you participated in the draw.

Options.PlotLineKey: Did you achieve that with strategy?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Not really... It's probably just luck. This draw's results are solely based on chance, making it impossible for even the most attentive strategy to predict.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, Lady Changli! I just checked the list. Looks like you've won the one and only surprise grand prize of this year's Moonlit Fair!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right. Well, I'd say... it's more of a treasure map? Or clues to the actual prize?

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Is that so?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just some context: our Pioneer Association team found this mysterious platform near Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was sealed with intricate puzzles, probably the work of the elusive Court of Savantae. We tried everything, but not even one puzzle budged.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then, someone joked about relying on luck to solve it.

Options.PlotLineKey: So you took that joke seriously.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yup. I realized this was the perfect candidate for Hsin's Fortuity grand prize. Only someone with ridiculous luck could win it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And who knows? Maybe they'd use that luck to uncover its hidden secrets.

Options.PlotLineKey: Well, Changli might actually be able to...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That sounds interesting.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Would you join me, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nice. I'll upload the keycode we found and the coordinates of that platform to your Terminals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wish you two the best of luck!

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Hmm, these mechanisms remind me of the Court of Savantae's technique.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Interesting. They used overlapping layers instead of their usual designs.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It has four mechanisms that need to be solved in the right order within time limit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the worst case, this platform could trigger its self-destruct mechanism and things might not look so good for us...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just kidding. I bet the Pioneer Association have attempted to solve this puzzle numerous times.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If they knew there was a fail-safe, they wouldn't have made finding this place a prize.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I guess it will just revert to its initial state.

Options.PlotLineKey: Well, that makes things easier. Let's test the combinations one by one.
We should look around for clues...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A viable approach. I estimate a total of 24 combinations... If you don't mind, {PlayerName}, we certainly can test them out one at a time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed we should.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well done, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder what it has in store for us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It appears there are no treasures here.

Options.PlotLineKey: Yeah. No treasure, just a book.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... interesting. This must be the "Riddle Master D's Latest Horror Riddles - Ultimate Collection" mentioned in that memoir.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As I guessed... The book is full of codes and diagrams on Automata Mechanics. It's complex, but it seems to be a guide for creating machines.

Options.PlotLineKey: The Riddle Master's not making it easy for us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nothing else to see here. Let's make our return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}. You're back! So? Did you find the treasure?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A book? Wait... Could it be... Can I have a look, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You hand the book to Xianchen.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... I knew it, this is the yet-to-be-discovered latest work of Riddle Master D!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Th-This is wild! I thought these books only existed in legends!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Riddle Master D's Super-Cool Magic Riddles", "Riddle Master D's Popular Hangout Riddles", "Riddle Master D's Ultimate Brainstorming Riddles"...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These books are our treasures, filled with masterpieces from the Court of Savantae's Riddle Master D.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our engineers dream of deciphering his works. It could aid explorers in navigating ancient traps.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do you mind putting this book under the Pioneer Association's care? Please!

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can have them, since they obviously mean a lot to you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xianchen
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, thank you! Thank you so much! We'll make sure to pay you handsomely for your help!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Xiancheng bows to you and Changli before leaving with the book.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Judging from the end results alone, we did manage to find the treasure, did we not? Only... in a slightly different way.

Options.PlotLineKey: Something tells me you saw that coming.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...So you've noticed? Yes, I've encountered this Riddle Master D in the archives before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The records mention his numerous creations and literary works. The Pioneer Association should be well-informed on him, since they frequently explore the wilderness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though, I wasn't really interested in the so-called treasure to begin with.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For me, the biggest gain today is not the treasure, nor the precious works of Riddle Master D.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh well... I wonder what it could be...

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll let you figure it out, {PlayerName}. Hehe... Until we meet again, then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What is it, {PlayerName}?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'd like another look at the hints.
I give up. Help me, Changli.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Defeat the Tacet Discords in the order of Yellow, Blue, Purple, then Red. That should solve the puzzle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm. Would you like me to solve it for you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Changli solves the puzzle for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wrong order.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's try again, {PlayerName}.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'd like another look at the hints.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The correct order should be: Yellow, Blue, Purple, and finally, Red.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wrong order.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's try again, {PlayerName}.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'd like another look at the hints.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The correct order should be: Yellow, Blue, Purple, and finally, Red.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wrong order.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's try again, {PlayerName}.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'd like another look at the hints.

Dialogues.Speaker: Changli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The correct order should be: Yellow, Blue, Purple, and finally, Red.
